ARABIC: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is a tree that emerges in the depths of the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is a tree that grows at the bottom of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is a tree that grows in the nethermost part of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Zaqqum) is a tree which grows from the deepest part of hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed it is a tree that sprouts from the base of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely it is a tree that-grows in the bottom of the hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is a tree that comes forth in the root of Hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it is a tree that springeth in the heart of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hellfire:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily it is a tree that springeth forth in the bottom of Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is a tree that rises from the depths of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-Fire:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is a tree that grows from the bottom of Hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is a tree that grows from the bottom of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:64] Indeed it is a tree that comes forth from the very source of Hell, in other words, from the depths of Hell, with its branches extending up through all its [different] levels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! it is a tree that springeth) grows (in the heart of hell) in the middle of hell.
